Arrow was caught direct and very hard and a large gash opens up under his r=
ight eye. He puts his hand up to his face and sees he was cut open. He then=
 tried to slap Stiller's face in a rage...

  From: *Orchid* 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, July 13, 2=
001 9:52 PM

  STILLE=
R





  (Stiller is punched directly in his left eye. He stumbles backward=
s but regains his balance. His vision in his left optic was now blurry. He =
blinks his left optic rapidly and runs at Arrow, throwing a left elbow at h=
is face...)

 =

Subject: Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


    Arrow is hit and h=
ard. He puts a hand on the ground to keep from falling over and throws a st=
raight punch, aiming for Stiller's left eye...

e -----

ER

iginal Message -----

                Arrow ducks the palm and steps right into Termitron's sh=
ots meant for Stiller. He's hit by them in the back and goes down to one kn=
ee.

                Burning Hammer stares at Perplex is stasis lock while =
everyone yelled "save Trinity!" He shakes his head...

                  MCGOWAN / BARRYMORE / STILLER / ALBA / VIRGO / LEE / DEPP=






                                (McGowan jumps over the 2 energy ball=

arrymore takes one of the energy balls to the chest but dodges the other wi=
